description.value: When you begin your turn @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] or unnoticed by your hunted prey, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to you until the end of your turn. If you're in natural surroundings, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Avoid Notice] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] at full speed.
